pr_title: Adds more obvious display for limited connection mode

timeline.message: Limited connection is enabled layout is added
Add a layout to indicate limited connection is active

timeline.bodyText: How about "You have enabled limited connection mode. All uploads are paused and will resume once you disable this mode." ?
